text: Edward Christopher Ollard is a British public servant and the current Clerk of the Parliaments. Ollard was appointed as Clerk of the Parliaments with the effect from 16 April 2017 for a term of three years. In April 2020, he was re- appointed for another three-year term. In September 2020, he announced though that he will retire from the office at Easter 2021. He served earlier as Clerk Assistant of the House of Lords. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Clerks of the Parliaments
title: Edward Ollard
